description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Kanuhura, Maldives. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Maldives Private Island Beachfront and Overwater Villas with Six Eateries, Renowned Spa & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Welcome to heaven on earth - Six Senses Kanuhura, a private island resort boasting aquamarine lagoons and pristine white sands, bright blue skies melting into the ocean, and palm trees swaying to a pleasant tropical breeze. Soundtracked by the soothing sounds of the ocean, discover absolute seclusion and fun-filled adventure with an escape to the land of barefoot-style luxury. Slip further into relaxation mode with a restorative wrap or massage at the resortâ€™s renowned spa, and watch as the sun dips below the oceanic horizon over a bite of sizzling fresh-caught reef fish at Drift, or savour wine and tapas from the best seat in the house on the northern tip of Kanuhura - The Point.

seo.title: Hoteles en Kanuhura - Maldives Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Kanuhura, Maldives con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
